resources.string: With Call Meter 3G you can monitor the usage of your calls, messages and data connections.
In order to get accurate statistics, it is important to accurately set Call Meter 3G as they will be billed.
Most users need only set their settings in menu Basic settings. Just set the number of inclusive minutes or messages, as well as adjust the cost of calls made, etc..
If your billing is more complex, for example because messages and calls are billed as merged units, you can import pre-configured rules. Just select the menu Import rule set.
In any case, when everything is set up, you can export your rules to me. Thus, all other users can benefit from your work.

The statistics are recalculated after each change to the configuration. This will take some time depending on the number of calls or messages and used phone. It therefore makes sense to adjust all the settings possible in one fell swoop.
The process can be greatly accelerated by the setting Beginning of recording or Delete logs older than.
Please note that no data statistics from before the last launch of the phone can be displayed.
Please note that killing the app can lead to corrupted (data) statistics.
